messages.name: _com_wix_fed_settings_GetGlobalSettingsForMigrationResponse
messages.displayName: Get Global Settings For Migration Response Object

members.name: state
members.doc: The state of the app

members.name: host
members.doc: Where this data is relevant

members.name: settings
members.doc: The global app settings

members.name: componentSettings
members.doc: Optional. All components listed. may include components from the site or oneApp

members.name: translations
members.doc: // Translatable textual assets (returns unfiltered global translations when languageKey is omitted)

docs.summary:
The state of the settings (Saved or Published) Possible values are:
  • NR - Not relevant
  • SAVED
  • PUBLISHED

The host in which the settings are displayed Possible values are:
  • NA
  • VIEWER
  • BUSINESS_MANAGER
  • ONE_APP
